markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Gnoll Hunter](/Monsters.aspx?ID=229)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Gnoll hunters serve their clans by hunting for food in the wilds, marauding along well-traveled roads, and tracking down escaped slaves.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Gnoll Hunter](/Monsters.aspx?ID=229)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Gnoll" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=219" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 178</row>

**Perception** +7; darkvision

**Languages**
[Gnoll](/Languages.aspx?ID=17)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** -1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77) (20 arrows)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 29

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
battle axe +10 ([Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d8+4 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d8+2 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortbow +10 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing

**Pack Attack**   A gnoll hunter deals 1d4 extra damage to any creature that’s within reach of at least two of the gnoll hunter’s allies.

**Rugged Travel**   A gnoll ignores the first square of difficult terrain it moves into each time it Steps or Strides.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-54" />
name: Gnoll Hunter
